attacks.name: High Voltage
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play Trainer cards during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Thunder Flare
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Lt. Surge's Jolteon, then flip a coin. If tails, Lt. Surge's Jolteon does 30 damage to itself.
